entries.s_317: All right.  I'll copy it into your datapad.
entries.s_316: I need to know where the crash is again.
entries.s_313: I'm very busy.  I'm sorry I can't talk to you right now.
entries.s_311: Erm...no need for any weapons, I assure you! The ship crashed on Talus.  If you don't hurt me, I'll copy the location to your datapad.
entries.s_309: Is your life really worth a silly rule like that?
entries.s_307: I suppose it is only helping out a concerned citizen.  The ship that you are looking for crashed on Talus.  I can copy the location to your datapad.
entries.s_305: Would these 1000 credits show that I'm a member of the Imperial Transit Authority?
entries.s_303: I'm sorry, but I cannot give out that kind of information unless you are a member of the Imperial Transit Authority.
entries.s_301: I need information about a ship that may be lost.
entries.s_299: Ah!  Here it is.  It crashed on Talus.  I will transmit the location to your datapad...sir.
entries.s_297: Come on, man!  I don't have all day.
entries.s_295: Yes sir.  Give me a moment to consult with my notes. Yes, I think that ship is here.  One more moment...
entries.s_293: There is no excuse for impertinence!  I need information on a missing ship, now.
entries.s_291: Yes sir.  I have been investigating that ship.  It appears that the ship was diverted to Talus, though I have no information as to whether it crashed due to a malfunction or hijacking.  I have been told, sir, that it is a low priority and likely won't be pursued for several more days. Here are the coordinates if you would like to investigate the crash site.
entries.s_289: I'm sure they are.  You are forgiven.  I need to know about a ship that is missing.
entries.s_287: Oh!  Excuse me sir.  Forgive my insolence.  Things have just been really busy here.
entries.s_285: I'm sure you can make time for someone of my influence.
entries.s_283: Ah Selan.  I hope she is doing well.  I don't see her near enough.  I have a moment, but as I said, I really am busy.
entries.s_279: I'm sorry, but I'm really busy.  What do you need?
entries.s_24: Looks like you found the crash.  I got a message from Valance Serth that he needs you again, if you would go out there.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (c_ddroid_amarent.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
